Items.Title: Application No. N 170425 (A) ZRY submitted by New York City Department of City Planning, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to create a definition, a use and, in designated areas, a special permit for self-service storage facilities and to establish APPENDIX J (Designated Areas in Manufacturing Districts).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, SELF STORAGE (Designated Areas in Manufacturing Districts).  (N 170425 (A) ZRY)

Items.Title: Application No. N 170425 (A) ZRY submitted by New York City Department of City Planning, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to create a definition, a use and, in designated areas, a special permit for self-service storage facilities and to establish APPENDIX J (Designated Areas in Manufacturing Districts).
Items.ActionName: Approved by Subcommittee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee with Modifications and Referred to CPC approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, SELF STORAGE (Designated Areas in Manufacturing Districts).  (N 170425 (A) ZRY)
